result.title: Bubble Cup No. 9 Kick-Off
result.content:
Hello!

I'm happy to announce the start of the 9th iteration of BubbleCup competition. BubbleCup is an ACM-style team competition organized by Microsoft Development Center Serbia held annually in Belgrade in September.

Qualifications consists of two online rounds which start on the 1st of April and May and last for 25 days. The best teams will compete in the 5 hours long finals in Belgrade.

Teams can consist of high school pupils or students. Students must attend the same university. Complete rules can be found here.

Best of luck in the competition!
